Parma_Polyhedra_Library::Recycle_Input

Parma_Polyhedra_Library::Recycle_Input Struct Reference

A tag class. More...

#include <ppl.hh>

Detailed Description

A tag class.

Tag class to distinguish those constructors that recycle the data structures of their arguments, instead of taking a copy.
